title: Stream: Chairlift – Something
body:
One of the most anticipated records of the year comes from **Chairlift** in the form of their sophomore LP **_Something_**.

Preceded by the fantastic lead single _Amanaemonesia_ way back in August, Something is a vibrantly enthralling eleven track release, merging the boundaries between synth-pop and folk. Stream the entire record below, which is out 24 January.

Via [KCRW](http://www.kcrw.com/music/programs/ap/ap120116chairlift_something)
